Scene.title: Creater
Scene.description: The root object of the scene.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: A group of multiple objects that can be moved or dâ€¦and drop objects into the Group in the Hierarchy.

Model.title: Model
Model.description: A 3D model in your scene, loaded from a GLTF URL or file.

Ground Plane.title: Ground Plane
Ground Plane.description: A flat ground plane that extends into the distance.

Box Collider.title: Box Collider
Box Collider.description: An invisible box that objects will bounce off of or rest on top of. Without colliders, objects will fall through floors and go through walls.

Ambient Light.title: Ambient Light
Ambient Light.description: A light which illuminates all objects in your scene.

Directional Light.title: Directional Light
Directional Light.description: A light which illuminates the entire scene, but emits along a single direction.

Hemisphere Light.title: Hemisphere Light
Hemisphere Light.description: A light which illuminates the scene from directly overhead.

Spot Light.title: Spot Light
Spot Light.description: A light which emits along a direction, illuminating objects within a cone.

Point Light.title: Point Light
Point Light.description: A light which emits in all directions from a single point.

Spawn Point.title: Spawn Point
Spawn Point.description: A point where people will appear when they enter your scene. The icon in the Viewport represents the actual size of an avatar.

Way Point.title: Way Point
Way Point.description: A point people can teleport to.

Skybox.title: Skybox
Skybox.description: Creates a visualization of an open sky and atmosphere around your scene. Also used as the environment map for your scene.

Floor Plan.title: Floor Plan
Floor Plan.description: Sets the walkable surface area in your scene.

Spawner.title: Spawner
Spawner.description: Spawns a model as an interactable object.

Link.title: Link
Link.description: Link to a room or a website.

Media Frame.title: Media Frame
Media Frame.description: A frame to capture media objects.

Audio Zone.title: Audio Zone
Audio Zone.description: Defines a 3D area where audio parameters are overriden for contained audio sources.

Troika Text.title: Troika Text
Troika Text.description: Creates a 3D text element using the troika-three-text library.

Shared Screen.title: Shared Screen
Shared Screen.description: It's a shared screen! You can share any media on the screen.
